src:
Prediksi Watford vs Chelsea 3 November 2019
01 Nov 2019, 16:46 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rentetan tujuh kemenangan Chelsea telah terputus dengan cara yang menyakitkan. Winning streak itu dihentikan sang rival Manchester United di ajang Carabao Cup. Namun, The Blues tak ingin larut dalam kekecewaan. Watford siap mereka jadikan sasaran pelampiasan di liga.
Peringkat 4 Chelsea akan bertandang ke Vicarage Road untuk menghadapi tim juru kunci Watford pada pekan ke-11 Premier League 2019/20, Minggu (03/11/2019).
Tengah pekan kemarin, Watford dan Chelsea sama-sama kandas di babak 16 besar Carabao Cup. Watford tersingkir setelah ditekuk tuan rumah Everton dua gol tanpa balas. Sementara itu, Chelsea kalah menjamu MU dengan skor 1-2.
Sebelum dikalahkan MU, pasukan Frank Lampard selalu menang dalam tujuh laga terakhirnya di semua ajang. Laju mereka telah terhenti, tapi harus segera bangkit dan kembali berlari jika ingin terus bersaing di papan atas.
Laga melawan Watford, yang belum menang sekali pun di Premier League musim ini, bisa jadi laga ideal bagi The Blues untuk membangun kembali kepercayaan diri mereka - terutama sebelum menghadapi Ajax Amsterdam di Liga Champions.
text:
Predictions Watford vs Chelsea 3 November 2019
Nov 01 2019, 16:46 by Bola.net
Soccer - Chelsea's seven-string win has been cut off in a painful way. Winning streak was stopped by rivals Manchester United in the Carabao Cup. However, the Blues did not want to dissolve in disappointment. Watford is ready for them to become a target for impingement in the league.
Rank 4 Chelsea will travel to Vicarage Road to face Watford's caretaker team in Week 11 of the Premier League 2019/20, Sunday (03/11/2019).
In the middle of last week, Watford and Chelsea both ran aground in the last 16 of the Carabao Cup. Watford was eliminated after the host Everton bent two goals without reply. Meanwhile, Chelsea lost to entertain MU with a score of 1-2.
Before being defeated MU, Frank Lampard's troops have always won in his last seven matches in all competitions. Their pace has stalled, but they must get up and run again if they want to continue competing at the top.
The match against Watford, who hasn't won even once in the Premier League this season, could be an ideal match for the Blues to rebuild their confidence - especially before facing Ajax Amsterdam in the Champions League.
